spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT Ipv4.Address, Bgp.RouterState FROM BgpRouterConfig as Bgp JOIN Ipv4If as Ipv4 ON Bgp.ParentHnd == Ipv4.ParentHnd WHERE Bgp.RouterState != "NONE"
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.DisplayName: Verify BGP Router(s) in ESTABLISHED State
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: Not all BGP Routers are ESTABLISHED

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT BgpRes.TxAdvertisedRouteCount FROM BgpRouterResults as BgpRes JOIN BgpRouterConfig as Bgp ON BgpRes.ParentHnd == Bgp.Handle WHERE TxAdvertisedRouteCount != 0 AND TxAdvertisedRouteCount != 1
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.DisplayName: Verify All Routes Transmitted by the Sender(s)
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.PassedVerdictExplanation: All routes were transmitted by the sender(s)
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: Not all routes were transmitted by the sender(s)

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT BgpRes.RxAdvertisedRouteCount FROM BgpRouterResults as BgpRes JOIN BgpRouterConfig as Bgp ON BgpRes.ParentHnd == Bgp.Handle WHERE RxAdvertisedRouteCount != 0 AND RxAdvertisedRouteCount != 1
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.DisplayName: Verify all routes received by the receiver(s)
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.PassedVerdictExplanation: All routes received by the receivers
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: Not all routes received by the receivers

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT (SELECT MIN(Timestamp) FROM Methodology_SamplingData WHERE BgpRouterResults_RxAdvertisedRouteCount = (SELECT MAX(BgpRouterResults_RxAdvertisedRouteCount) FROM Methodology_SamplingData)) - (SELECT MIN(Timestamp) FROM Methodology_SamplingEvent) AS ConvergenceTime WHERE ConvergenceTime > 0
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.DisplayName: Determine the Convergence Time (first route transmitted to last route received)
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: No validation performed on Convergence Time
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.Name: Results: Verify DB Query (Convergence Time)

spirent.methodology.ExportDbChartCommand.Title: BGP Route Reflector Convergence
spirent.methodology.ExportDbChartCommand.Name: Results: Export DB Chart to JSON Command 1
